channel.title: Item Cost
channel.description:
How can I change the amount of money you have to pay to get the item.. not like donating or anything just buying an item from a shop in your server.. How can I do that?
Like if I wanted to buy a Dragon Scimitar for 1,500,000 GP..

item.title: Item Cost
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

First three numbers after an item’s description are the prices, first is buy price, second is low alch and third high alch. I honestly don’t know though because I leave all of the prices for each item the same.

Read full topic

item.title: Item Cost
item.dc:creator: @4markie 4markie
item.description:
@4markie wrote:

Go to Item.cfg

I’ll use Dragon scim as an eg.

You’ll see something like this when you find the item ID

item = 4587	Dragon_scimitar	A_vicious,_curved_sword.	PRICEHERE 	PRICEHERE	PRICEHERE	8	67	-2	0	0	0	1	0	0	0	66	0

Change PRICEHERE to your price…

So basically search your item ID, Find an line like that and change the first 3 lines of numbers after the item description to the price you want.

Read full topic

item.title: Item Cost
item.dc:creator: @Project_Evolution Project Evolution
item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

Item.CFG is the place to look.

Read full topic
